textBlocks.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Amani Foundation - Building bridges of hope and opportunity across East Africa.
textBlocks.aboutUs: Amani Foundation is dedicated to sustainable development and community empowerment in Kenya, Tanzania, and Uganda. We focus on education, healthcare, and economic development initiatives.
textBlocks.missionStatement: To empower communities through sustainable development, education, and healthcare initiatives that create lasting positive change in East Africa.
textBlocks.contactInfo: Contact us at info@amani.org or +254-700-123456 for more information about our programs and volunteer opportunities.
